sent.orig: Coat the pork chop with flour, then dip in beaten egg, finally coat with bread crumbs.
sent.trans: 将猪排先沾上面粉，再沾满蛋汁，最后沾裹上面包粉。

sent.orig: Papers go in lower coat pockets and if secret in upper coat pockets.
sent.trans: 应该把文件放在上衣的下面口袋里，如果是密件，必须放在上面的口袋里。

sent.orig: Both types of coat are hard in texture and neither coat is preferable to the other.
sent.trans: 两种被毛类型的毛发的质地都很硬，两种毛发类型一视同仁。

sent.orig: He wore a thick coat over his ordinary coat.
sent.trans: 他在普通的上衣上面又穿了一件厚外衣。

sent.orig: Coat-A sled dog cannot exist in a primitive environment without a proper coat.
sent.trans: 毛——一只雪橇犬若是没有秀而正确的毛，将不能在原始的环境中生存。
